about_the_game:
Experience the Fun with Duels Soccer!

Have you ever played a soccer game that you enjoyed even when you lost? Welcome to Duels Soccer, the fun and engaging game that challenges the traditional rules of soccer, putting you in control in a whole new way!

Enjoy a dynamic and exciting experience where strategy and skill are important, but it's the element of luck and chaos that makes it truly fun. Discover unique ways to play and rethink what you know about how soccer should be enjoyed.

Get ready to explore and master the diverse mechanics of Duels Soccer, where each skill becomes a crucial tool to win and stand out on the field:

Walk, Run, Move Strategically: Control your player with complete freedom, from walking and running to more calculated and slower movements, allowing for a unique strategic approach on the field.

Precise and Strategic Kicks: The ability to kick is not just about strength but also about accuracy. Each kick defines the fate of the match and requires timing and strategy.

name: Duels Soccer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz or better
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Master the Art of Headers and Strategy: Elevate your 2-player matches with precise ball control and headers in Duels Soccer, outsmarting opponents with thrilling, strategic plays.
